summary: HUB AND BEARING ASSEMBLY, ONLY TO FIND THAT IT IS A COMMON PROBLEM, THIS CAR HAS LITTLE LESS THAN 40,000 MILES ON IT, PAYING UP THE YANG YANG JUST BUYING IT, AND ALREADY HAVING A PROBLEM WITH IT, PLEASE NOTE, THAT MUCH OF THIS IS LONG DISTANCE DRIVING, IS IT CHEAP ASSEMBLY PARTS, OR JUST BAD WORKMANSHIP? SAID WEAR AND TEAR, IF IT IS A COMMON PROBLEM, MUST NOT BE WEAR AND TEAR, MUST HAVE A CHEAP PART.  *NLM
